name: CampK9
title: CampK9
description: CampK9 allows dog trainers to add dogs they are training, and record the daily progress made for each dog which is then reflected in different graphs.  This is a full-stack, responsive MERN application designed using Mongoose, Express, React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS Authentication, Cloudinary, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Chart.js, and is deployed via Heroku.

name: GameTracker
title: GameTracker
description: GameTracker allows users to maintain a database of their personal games across all platforms.  This is a full-stack web application designed using the MVC paradigm with server-side API.  Technologies used include JavaScript, Node, Express, MySQL, Handlebars, Passport Authentication, Bcrypt JS, Datatables, Bootstrap, and is deployed via Heroku.

name: Employee Directory
title: Employee Directory
description: Employee Directory allows the user to quickly view an entire simulated employee directory to access information about each individual employee. Users are able to filter the results by entering text in the search input.  Technologies used include React.js, Bootstrap, Axios, and it is deployed via Netlify.

name: Budget Tracker
title: Budget Tracker
description: Budget Tracker is a progressive web app that allows users to maintain an accurate budget of their deposits/expenses - even when the app is offline.  Technologies used include JavaScript, Node, Express, Mongoose, and it is deployed via Heroku.

name: Fitness Tracker
title: Fitness Tracker
description: Fitness Tracker allows the user to view, create, and track daily workouts. The user can track the name, type, weight, sets, reps, and duration of each exercise. If the exercise type is cardio it will allow the user to track the distance traveled.  Technologies used include Node, Express, Mongoose, JavaScript, and it is deployed via Heroku.
